amendment.description: To ban commercial advertising on the National Mall.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1740 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 92 - 4. Record Vote Number: 358.

action.text: Amendment SA 1740 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S11733-11734; text: CR S11733) To ban commercial advertising on the National Mall.
